author: Staff Reporter
text:
S. Kowsalya (18) was killed and Suganya (18) sustained injuries when the motorcycle they were travelling was allegedly knocked down by an unidentified vehicle along Karatholvu-Kaniyur road on Saturday night. Kowsalya was riding pillion.

Suganya has been admitted to a hospital in Coimbatore. The Kaniyur police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Killed in road accident
